name: Webigraph Addons for Elementor
author: Webigraph

sections.description:
Webigraph Addons for Elementor WordPress frontend drag & drop page builder. This plugin has elementor widgets, For this widgets, easy to add inline multi heading or text with fully customization and also add inline multi button with fully customization. Also create underfull design and customization every heading or text and also every buttons. This Plugin also included Easy text editor, you can easily edit text with separately including color, size, font and more. Also included Modal box, you can easily make modal box.

Check out Demos

  • Check demos — This plugin has many features that you could use it for many purposes.
sections.installation:
Note : This plugin works with Elementor. Make sure you have Elementor installed.

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Now you can go the elementor editor section and check there have webigraph addons. There have Webigraph Addons elementors.
  4. Then You can drop and drag this elements.
  5. Create inline multi buttons and texts or headings with easy to customizations.
  6. Done!
sections.faq:
Could I use this plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No, it’s not work. You could not use without Elementor since it’s a widget for Elementor Page Builder.

Does this pluign work with any types of theme?

Yes, it’s work! But This plugin will work with any theme where Elementor Page Builder works.

Does this plugin support Elementor Pro?

Yes, it’s also use if you install the Elementor Pro.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial Launch

1.1.0

  • Add Easy text edit and Modal box widgets.
